classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Application Frameworks
info.description:
Dynamism is a framework for developing real-time software systems, and is typically used for distributed 
robotics control systems.  Dynamism includes a simple C API, a network-abstracted database for sharing 
data, data logging capabilities, and bindings for high-level languages such as Python.
info.name: Dynamism
info.html_description: Dynamism is a framework for developing real-time software systems, and is typically used for distributed robotics control systems. Dynamism includes a simple C API, a network-abstracted database for sharing data, data logging capabilities, and bindings for high-level languages such as Python.
